Title: 39943 - # Quick Tips to Earn Brownie Points With Your Boss
Direction: 500 words. Write 3-6 tips for impressing your boss at work. Such as new apps, programs, or software to try out, rules or strategies to implement and giving creative input on projects that you feel passionate about.
